prompt: Tyndareus, the king of Sparta, looks on as the suitors swear the oath. He sits on a throne, his face serious and wise. The suitors stand before him, their hands raised in oath-taking. The background is a subtle gray, with the throne and suitors in sharp focus. The camera angle is slightly overhead, looking down on the scene.
dialogue: If you swear to defend the chosen husband, I will choose the one who is greatest in possessions.
